newsitem.title: USA: U.S. to sell $27 billion of 3-, 6-mo bills Dec 30.
newsitem.headline: U.S. to sell $27 billion of 3-, 6-mo bills Dec 30.

text.p: The Treasury Department said on Tuesday it will auction $27 billion of three- and six-month bills on December 30 to pay down $1.575 billion as $28.570 billion of bills are maturing.
The weekly bill sale will be equally divided between the two maturities. The bills will be issued on January 2. The three-month bills mature on April 3 and the six-month bills mature on July 3.
The CUSIP number for the three-month bills is 9127942N3 and for the six-month bills is 9127945D2.
